content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ New exceptions available for XDR for Cloud - AWS CloudTrail detections August 30, 2024—Detection Model Management now supports creating detection exceptions for your Amazon S3 buckets using the bucket name. Set the Match Criteria field type to cloud_identifier, select requestParameters.bucketName for the field, and provide the bucket name. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Detection Model Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: New exceptions available for XDR for Cloud - AWS CloudTrail detections
